Title: Wren Boys (1)
Plot: The team re-investigates the death of a teenage boy who was found on a building site some years ago, drowned in concrete. Part of a human ear is found in his stomach, linking him to the dumping of another seriously injured teenager in a hospital at around the same time. The ground on which the dead teenager was found belongs to a Catholic abbey which is soon to be dissolved, and the abbey owns a shrine which might contain evidence and has to be dismantled - a task which falls to the unwilling St
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Ruairi Conaghan,  Carey  Mulligan,  Edward MacLiam,  Tony Scannell,  Gabrielle Reidy
